intro.title: Remote Working Made Easy
intro.text: Pltfrm wants to create a new way to work with and for the independent workforce. Built for nomadic mobility with career stability, we believe it should be effortless for freelancers and clients to work together.

goal.title: ONE SIMPLE GOAL
goal.text: When everything you need is in one place, working together is easy. We want to make it simple for companies and contractors to collaborate all within one flexible tool.
